com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.javafx

Class BrowserView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
        • com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.javafx.internal.WidgetView
          • com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.javafx.BrowserView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class BrowserView
extends com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.javafx.internal.WidgetView
    Represents JavaFX container for Browser instance. You can embed this container into any other JavaFX container to display web pages loaded in corresponding Browser object.

        public BrowserView(Browser browser)
        Creates a new BrowserView container that will display the passed browser instance.
